title: QAQ多世界插件求助。怎么暂时关闭其中一个世界。
author: 阿咧。
txt_content:
就是禁止传送或者back进去。全部人回到默认世界。
求指令。顺便求开启那个世界的指令。

replies.author: 芙兰的杯子
replies.txt_content:
Multiworld的话
用/mw list可以发现每个世界名字后面都有（load)

用/mw unload world
就可以让world这个世界unload 也就是没有载入

想要恢复就用/mw load world

以上两个命令里的world是世界名，你要暂停一个叫aaa世界的就把命令里的world改成aaa

replies.author: 芙兰的杯子
replies.txt_content:
顺便附上Multiworld所有命令（英文说明，不过基本看得懂）

Commands:
world commands
        /mw listgens - list the supported world gens
        /mw create <world name> [gen] 
        /mw delete <wold name> - removes an world
        /mw load <world> - loads an world
        /mw unload <world> - unloads an world, does not work whit default worlds
        /mw info [world] - List some information about an world, like seed and generator used.
        /mw list - list all the worlds loaded on the server, an give them colors based on the environment.
portal control commands
        /mw link <world1> <world2> - links al nether porta;ls from world 1 to world 2
        /mw link-end <world1> <world2> - links al nether porta;ls from world 1 to world 2
world option commands
        /mw flags - list the posiable flags to use
        /mw setflag <world> <flagname> <value> - sets an flag on a world
        /mw getflag <world> <flagname> - gets an flag from a world, tip use * to get al the world flags
teleportation commands
        /mw goto <world nanme> - go to that world - alias "/goto <world>"
        /mw move <player> <world> - Moves an player to an world
spawn commands
        /mw spawn - teleports to spawn
        /mw setspawn - sets the spawn of a world, because the initial spawn point is not always good
plugin commands
        /mw save - saves the plugin data
        /mw reload - reload the plugin data
Utiliti commands
        /mw debug - shwows some debugging info
